DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Study CAMPATH Patients With Relapsing Refractory Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct 2 part primary objective part 1 determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) CAMPATH ( alemtuzumab , MABCAMPATH , CAMPATH ) administer intravenously ( IV ) week treatment relapse refractory non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma ( NHL ) . The primary objective part 2 determine overall response rate ( complete response , CR/unconfirmed , plus partial response ) weekly IV CAMPATH treatment relapse refractory NHL . This Phase I/II study , open-label , multicenter study evaluate efficacy safety weekly IV CAMPATH therapy patient relapse refractory non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma .
